comment.body:
I have checked it here - `https://www.newstalkzb.co.nz/podcasts/the-leighton-smith-podcast/` and I cannot reproduce it.
You have a lot of options enabled in `Stealth mode` which can also cause such issue, so please additionally check if issue occurs with `Stealth mode` disabled.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Enable AdGuard Chinese instead of EasyList, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to clear browser data, leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
다음 절차를 진행해주세요.
1. 다음 필터를 제외한 필터를 비활성화해주세요:
 - AdGuard 베이스 필터
 - AdGuard 모바일 광고 필터
 - AdGuard 추적 보호 필터
 - AdGuard URL 추적 필터
 - AdGuard 소설 필터
 - AdGuard 방해 요소 필터
 - List-KR 필터

2. 삼성 브라우저에 대해 HTTPS 필터링이 켜져 있는지 AdGuard for Android -> `앱 관리` -> `삼성 브라우저` 순으로 이동하셔서서 확인해주세요.
3. 삼성 브라우저의 캐시, 사이트 데이터와 쿠키를 모두 삭제해주세요.

그래도 안되거나 도움이 필요하시면, filters@adguard.com 으로 이메일을 보내주세요.

comment.body:
Even with VPN I'm redirected to `msn.com`, so I cannot check it, but maybe the same rules as for `msn.com` will work on `msn.cn`.
Could you please add these rules:
```adblock
msn.cn#%#//scriptlet('inject-css-in-shadow-dom', 'cs-native-ad-card-no-hover, display-ads, .display-ad-container, .display-ads-container, .views-right-rail-top-display, #entry-point-hp-wc-banner, .me-stripe-title-subtitle, #displayAdCard, a[href*=".booking.com/"], a[href^="https://amzn.to/"] { display: none !important; }')
msn.cn#%#//scriptlet('inject-css-in-shadow-dom', 'cs-native-ad-card { visibility: hidden !important; }')
msn.cn#%#//scriptlet('inject-css-in-shadow-dom', '#entry-point-hp-wc-header[style^="top:"] { top: 0 !important; }')
msn.cn#%#//scriptlet('inject-css-in-shadow-dom', '#entry-point-hp-wc-root-wrapper[style^="margin-top:"] { margin-top: 0 !important; }')
msn.cn#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', '*.*', 'adFeedbackData adType adServedUrls')
```
to user rules and then check if these ads are still displayed?
